title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 43.9 - Firm installation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 43.9 - Firm installation

State Regulations
A machine shall be installed on a firm and substantial base
and, unless rendered stable by its weight, design or method of installation, shall be securely fastened in place by means requiring the use of tools for
loosening or removing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
43.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
